customer_name: Keeper of the Wild Wildlife Rescue and Sanctuary
site_name: Keeper of the Wild Wildlife Rescue and Sanctuary

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:26pm on April 2,
2024. Upon arrival, the licensee was contacted by phone, stating they were out of town, with no one available to conduct
an inspection.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:26pm on April 2, 
2024. Upon arrival, the licensee was contacted by phone, stating they were out of town, with no one available to conduct 
an inspection. 
 
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
